column3: Main Description (used in Web & AMO)

The Drive Mercury Neo 6 is an excellent addition to the Mercury range of scooters, it has suspension to the front of the scooter which helps you to enjoy a comfortable ride. 

The Neo 6 comes with standard features like front and rear lights, it is a very flexible scooter for use whenever you need it.

This scooter is the 6 mph version which means that you can us it on the road if you wish but it has a 4 mph switch for pavement use. If you are looking for something a little 

faster take a look at the Neo 8 the 8mph version.

The standard seat swivels to allow you easy access to the scooter whilst having the power to carry a 21 stone passenger up to 20 miles between charges.

The Drive Mercury Neo 6 mobility scooter offers excellent all-round value and you can choose to upgrade to the 8 mph Neo mobility scooter if you wish!

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call 

out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Pride Mobility Colt Deluxe 6 mph mobility scooter is a mid range scooter sitting between the 

excellent range of Pride 4 mph mobilty scooters and the bigger, high performance 8 mph mobility 

scooter range.

The Colt Deluxe has a 6mph maximum speed with a range on full charge of up to 20 miles, the Colt 

Deluxe enjoys many of the features of the bigger mobility scooters whilst maintaining very compact 

dimensions.

The Colt Deluxe offers a maximum user weight of 28 stones and a potential range of 20 miles 

between charges.

The Pride Colt Deluxe Mobility Scooter will easy to dismantle for occasional transport, with both 

lights and indicators you are assured of a safe ride on the Pride Colt Plus. Adding to the smooth 

ride the captains seat is fully adjustable and has suspension, this ensures that you enjoy a 

really smooth and comfortable ride whatever the terrain.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to 

your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free 

scooter insurance all for the price you see!

CareCo are proud to introduce to you the CareCo Universe 4 wheel 8 mph mobility scooter. The 

Universe is equipped with the latest technology and packed full of features at an incredible 

price. 

Ensuring the riders comfort is very important to us, the Universe comes equipped with independent 

suspension on both the front and rear wheels to provide a smooth ride over different terrains.
To ensure the ride is as comfortable as possible careful attention has been taken on the seat 

which can rotate through 360 degrees and has foldable backrest, with additional adjustment in the 

backrest you are assured of a comfortable ride.


Safety is a key feature in our mobility scooters, careful attention to safety is paramount on the 

CareCo Universe Scooter, for the evenings the Universe comes complete with indicators, front and 

rear lights and a horn. The dashboard has a state of the art tip touch display giving you battery 

level and other useful information. The electro magnetic braking system on the CareCo Universe 

ensures you stop with confidence.

The Universe can carry a 27 stone passenger up to 20 miles in between charging making the Univers 

ideal for larger mobility users. To ensure your comfort the tiller is height adjustable to allow 

you to set it correctly for you.


All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to 

your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free 

scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Electric Mobility Rascal 388 XL mobility scooter is an on road, 6mph Class 3 mobility scooter. The Rascal 388XL is designed with a narrow, compact chassis to allow easy manoeuvring at home or around the shops,  its 

narrow 21" width ensures the 388XL is a powerful yet nimble mobility scooter.

With comfort in mind the Electric Mobility Rascal 388xl boasts a fully adjustable Captains seat with headrest to ensure your comfort whilst using the scooter. With the combination of the captains seat with the all round 

suspension and large 11" pneumatic tyres you know the ride quality will be exceptionally smooth.

The Rascal has two 34 ah batteries which give the 388XL a range of up to 20 miles between charges and a maximum user weight capacity of over 21 stone. The Rascal 388XL can be used as either 6mph scooter or if 

pavement use is required there is a 4 mph switch to limit the top speed of your scooter. The Rascal 388XL also has an exceptional ground clearance of 3.5". 

The Rascal 388 XL mobility scooter offers plenty of leg room, comfort and lots of range! 

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the 

price you see!

The Roma Perrero mobility scooter is ideal for those looking for a compact scooter with an all round set of features, capable of a maximum speed of 6mph it can (also switchable to a maximum of 4mph for pavement use). It €™s 

narrow width means that the scooter can still be used around many shops and will also allow the scooter to go through most standard doorways with ease.

The Roma Perrero is a Class 3 Mobility Scooter the Shoprider Perrero and comes with both front and rear lights as well as indicators.

The captain €™s seat is height adjustable and can also slide backwards and forwards to easily find the ideal seating position giving you the maximum legroom. The backrest is also adjustable to ensure the utmost comfort and 

the whole seat swivels to allow the user easy access on and off the mobility scooter.

In addition to the padded seat and pneumatic tyres the Shoprider Perrero also features front and rear suspension giving this scooter an impressive smooth ride.

The Roma Perrero scooter comes as standard with 36ah batteries giving a maximum range of 25 miles, with a maximum user weight of 21 stone the Perrero gives you the speed, power and distance you would expect from a 

much larger mobility scooter.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the 

price you see!

The Freerider Kensington S2 is a popular 8 mph mobility scooter, packed with features and at an affordable price. The popularity of the Kensington S2 is probably due to it €™s proven classic design and robust specification. The 

Kensington has all of the features you are likely to need from a mobility scooter.

With  all round suspension, 12 inch pneumatic tyres and swivelling padded captain €™s seat the ride quality is smooth even on uneven ground. The Freerider Kensington comes complete with two heavy duty 50ah batteries to 

allow an amazing maximum range of up to 35 miles between charges. The tiller is infinitely adjustable allowing you to find the mosty comfortable position for you, the seat is also fully adjustbale to enable the user to find a 

comfortable seating position.

The Freerider Kensington SII is availble in a selection of 2 colours, red and blue, with finishing touches like mirror, shopping basket and a full lighting package with indicators the Kensington S2 is a well built mobility scooter 

that €™s also comfortable and superb value for money. 

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the 

price you see!

The Drive Mercury Neo 8 is the top of the  range Mobility Scooter from Drive Medical, with a huge list of features this flagship 

scooter is luxury on wheels.

A comfortable ride is assured on Neo 8, with front suspension and 10 inch pnuematic tyres all designed to help you to enjoy a 

comfortable ride, the standard Captains chair on this mobility scooter swivels to allow you easy access to the scooter, fold up 

arm rests for more flexibility, the captains seat also has an adjustable headrest all designed to bring you the maximum comfort 

and support.

The safety features on the Neo 8 are what you would imagine from Drive Medical one of the UKs largest scooter suppliers. 

With lights at both the front and rear and indicators and robust bumbers front and rear it is a very flexible and safe mobility 

scooter, ready whenever you need it.

The Neo 8 scooter is capable of a top speed of 8 mph which means that you can us it on the road if you wish, the Neo 8 also 

has a 4 mph switch for pavement use so you can easily switch between 8moh and 4mph as the conditions suit.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Electric Mobility Rascal 650 Mobility Scooter is a class 3 mobility scooter capable of a top speed of 6mph, packed full of 

technology to make this scooter feature packed and finished with classic styling.

You can tell comfort is important on the Rascal 650, it has a Captains seat which can be adjusted forward and backwards to 

ensure you are comfortable, the 5 position tiller ensures you can adjust the tiller to your particular taste. These features are 

further enhanced by 11 inch pneumatic tyres and a complete suspension system to ensure your journey is safe, enjoyable 

and smooth.

The Electric Mobility Rascal 650 benefits from an increased battery capacity, being fitted with two heavy duty 50 ah batteries 

as standard. This larger batteries allows a maximum range of 24 miles carrying a maximum passenger weight of 2.5 stone, a 

truly robust mobility scooter.

The Rascal 650 also benefits from a full lighting package, including indicators front and rear and an amazing 6 inch ground 

clearance.

Available in red and charcoal grey, the Electric Mobility Rascal 650, is equally at home on the road or the pavement, and is an 

exceptional example of a 6 mph mobiltiy scooter.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Pride Celebrity X Sport is an 8 mph class 3 Mobility Scooter and is available exclusively from CareCo. The Pride X Sport has 

been one of the UKs most popular mobility scooters for a number of years. The Celebrity X Sport delivers all of the features and 

performance that you expect from a high-end 8mph scooter, in a more compact design and arguably better all round value.

The X Sport has all the features you expect from a brand leader like Pride Mobility, comfort and safety as always is kept at the 

forefront of the scooter design and construction. Boasting standard features such as large pnuematic tyres, captains seat and 

adjustable tiller the Celebrity X Sport is designed to fit to your specific requirements.

The Celebrity X Sport is built for a comfort ride with all round suspension to smooth our bumpy terrain, a fully adjustable captains 

seat to ensure you can adjust the scooter to fit you perfectly. The large pnuematic tyres also help to provide a smooth effortless 

journey and also gives an amazing 3.5 inch ground clearance. 

The list of features available on the Celebrity X Sport is amazing, a handbrake, wrap around delta tiller, lighting package and quick 

dissasembly are just a few standard options on the Prode Celebrity X Sport. The lighting package also includes indicators at the 

front and rear to ensure you can see and be seen when it starts to get dark.

The powerful 40 ah batteries give the scooter a 25 mile maximum range on a full charge, couple this with a maximum user weight of 

of 25 stone and you can see why the Pride Celebrity X Sport is so popular. Unlike many of the larger scooters available on the 

market today the Pride Celebrity X Sport can easily dismantle into managable sized parts to enable you to transport the scooter 

with you on  long journeys.

With its fine balance of sleek looks, safety and power the Pride Celebrity X Sport gives you the best of both worlds, top end 

capability and a compact user friendly size.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Shoprider Cadiz Mobility Scooter is a luxurious 8mph, class 3, road legal scooter with a modern design, and many unique features. It is beautifully styled, powerful and has some excellent luxury features.

The Shoprider Cadiz mobility scooter has large 13 inch pneumatic tyres and a full suspension system to provide a smooth ride. Add this to an extremely comfortable, and fully adjustable Captain seat with headrest, fold up 

arm rests and the option to move the seat backwards and forwards you are assured to find the perfect position for a comfortable ride wherever your journey may take you.

The Shoprider Cadiz mobility scooter also has a speed switch to reduce the speed from 8mph to 4mph, so that it can be legally used on the pavement as well as the road. Powerful 34 ah batteries give you a maximum range 

of 20 miles between charges, and a very respectable maximum user weight of 25 stone. Adding to your comfort the Cadiz has 13 inch pnuematic wheels which gives you a smooth ride and an incredible 6 inch clearance, 

almost 3 times that of a standard travel scooter. 

The infinite adjustment available on the tiller ensures easy to reach controls make driving the Shoprider Cadiz very easy, the adjustable Delta tiller also allows the scooter to be driven using just one hand. With safety in mind, 

the Shoprider Cadiz scooter also comes with a fulll lighting package with front and rear lights, indicators, hazard warning lights and also a horn for your additional safety.

You begin to see why this is such a popular 8 mph scooter.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the 

price you see!

The Colt Sport Mobility Scooter from Pride Mobility is an amazing looking class 3 mobility scooter, with sleek modern lines it delivers all of the features and performance that you expect from a high-end 8mph scooter, and all 

in a compact package, buying from CareCo you also get better all round value.

The Colt Sport has your comfort in mind with its 10 inch wheels and full suspension you are sure to have a comfortable ride whilst using this scooter. Adding to the features of this scooter it also includes a comfortable 

Captains seat with head rest, arm rests and the ability to recline the chair to suit your personal needs, the Pride Sport has it all. 

The same attention has gone into the safety features of this mobility scooter with standard features such as handbrake, dual braking system, full lighting and indicator package including a powerful LED headlight and brake 

light ensuring you are seen and can see where you are going. 

The two powerful 40 ah batteries at the heart of the Pride Colt Sport give you a maximum range on full charge of up to 21 miles, couple this with a maximum user weight of 25 stone and the Colt Sport should be the only 

scooter you will ever need. 

The long list of features, compact design and manufactured by one of the UK's best know manufacturers makes the Pride Colt Sport a serious contender for anyone considering a new scooter this year.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the 

price you see!

The Sterling Diamond mobility scooter from Sunrise Medical is superb value, and a fantastic performer in the 8 mph class 3 mobility scooter category.

With powerful 50 ah batteries it can carry a user up to 23.5 stone in weight a maximum of up to 24 miles, this make the Sterling Diamond great for those longer journeys. Ensuring a comfortable ride at all times is achieved due 

to it's all round suspension system and comfortable seat. The suspension helps to keep the ride smooth when on uneven terrain, and large 13 inch wheels provide great traction and fantastic ground clearance.

Fitted with a full lighting package including front and rear indicators, you can see and be seen when riding the Steling Diamond. Both the tiller and the seat are height adjustable, allowing you to achieve a comfortable driving 

position. The Sterling Diamond also has a luxury padded Captain style seat that can be altered to suit your personal taste, with width adjustment, a head rest and fold up arm rests, comfort is assured with this scooter!

The controls are very easy to operate, with the built-in finger or thumb control lever, on an ergonomically designed delta handlebar with a warm foam grip.

With style at the top of the agenda, the sleek black body panels, chrome bumpers and alloy wheels all go to make the Sterling Diamond Mobility Scooter an elegant yet capable mobility scooter.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the 

price you see!

The Electric Mobility Rascal 850 Mobility Scooter is an 8mph, class 3 mobility scooter which utilises the latest technology with a 

clean modern styling. More compact than some other 8 mph models, the Rascal 850 is still packed full of features.

Comfort is a key feature on the Rascal 850 mobility scooter, it comes with a comfortable adjustable Captains seat with lumbar 

support, head rest and arm rests. The 12 inch pneumatic tyres, and all round coil suspension ensure your journey is smooth and 

enjoyable on uneven terrain. The Rascal 850 mobility scooter also has an impressive ground clearance of 6 inches almost 3 times 

that of a standard travel scooter.

The Electric Mobility Rascal 850 is fitted with two heavy duty 50 ah batteries which increases the maximum range up to a possible 

24 miles on a full charge, ensuring you will get to where you want to go.

Safety is key on the Rascal 850, a full lighting package, including indicators front and rear to ensure you can see and be seen when 

it starts to get dark. The tiller has a multi-function position option, and lifts up out of the way to allow easy access to the scooter. 

The Electric Mobility Rascal 850, is the perfect scooter for the pavement or road use, fully packed with all the features you could 

possibly need the Rascal 850 mobility scooter is an exceptional example of a compact 8 mph mobility scooter.

Available in 2 stylish colours, red and black, please make your selection when placing your order.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The 8 mph Envoy 8 mobility scooter is a stylish addition to the Drive Mercury range of scooters. It includes a whole host of excellent features that you come to expect from a manufacturer like Drive Medical.

An comfortable, smooth ride is assured with all round suspension system fitted as standard. The, comfort continues with the Captains chair with the well upholstered, adjustable Captains seat you should be able to find the perfect seating position whilst using the scooter.

The tiller is adjustable to suit the users preferred position and to ensure maximum foot room, the delta steering control is more comfortable for longer journeys, and makes controlling the scooter easier for those who have arthritus or issues with their grip. If you plan to use the Envoy 8 for trips to the shops there is also a sturdy front basket as standard.

From a safety perspective the Drive Medical Envoy 8 comes with a full light system front and rear, including a powerful LED front light and indicators. There is also a rear view mirror and a separate cable brake for added safety and peace of mind.

Although the Envoy 8 may have compact dimensions, there is no compromise regarding the performance of this mobility scooter. With a top speed of 8 mph, and a weight capacity of up to 25 stone, it is on a par with many larger models. Couple this with the impressive range of up to 30 miles between charges due to the heavy duty 50 a/h batteries, and you can see why the Drive Mercury 8 mph Envoy is a class leader.

The Envoy 8 carries the Drive Mercury brand, this ensures a focus on comfort, style, performance and reliability.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Roma Granada 8mph Mobility Scooter is a class 3 scooter for use on the pavement or road, it boasts a range of features found 

on top of the range mobility scooters.

The Roma Granada comes with a comfortable, fully adjustable swivel Captains seat. Couple this with all round suspension and 12 

inch pnuematic wheels and you have a smooth comfortable ride. The powerul 50  ah batteries gives an impressive range of up to 

25 miles between charges at up to 8 mph. 
The maximum user weight for this mobility scooter is 25 stone, the larger wheels helps to provide an impressive ground clearance 

of 5 inches, with shopping basket and rear view mirrors the Roma Granada has it all.

An easy to read LED dashboard and front and rear light package come as standard. The tiller is multi-positional to ensure the 

correct position for the rider can be achieved with the maximum leg room. 

Please note that the Roma Granada mobility scooter is available in red only.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

An comfortable, smooth ride is assured with all round suspension system fitted as standard. The, comfort continues with the

Although the Envoy 6 may have compact dimensions, there is no compromise on the performance of this mobility scooter. With a

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and

The Drive Mercury Regatta 8 is the latest addition to the very popular Mercury range of mobility scooters from Drive Medical. This 

scooter is easy to operate and has all the latest technology to make it quiet, smooth and comfortable.

The Drive Mercury Regatta comes with a huge range of features as standard. A focus on rider comfort is obvious when you look at 

the Admirals seat, adjustment can be made to the height and angle of the back along with the width of the arm rests. To give you 

complete and easy access to the scooter the seat also rotates. Located on the rear of the chair is a handy storage pocket to 

compliment the large shopping basket.

With the focus staying on comfort, the Regatta 8 comes with fully adjustable, all-round suspension, you can adjust the suspension 

to match your terrain easily for a smooth ride. 

The powerful 40 ah batteries can carry a maximum weight capacity of 23 stone, and has a range of up to 20 miles, incredible! 

Look at the numerous safety features this scooter has; anti tip wheels, lights and indicators, all round suspension, twin rear view 

mirrors, auto electric safety braking system, anti slip footwell, easy to use controls. As much detail has gone into the safety aspects 

of this scooter as the comfort of the ride. This is probably one of the best equipped 8 mph scooter in this price range.

Available in a choice 5 colours; Green, Blue, Red, Black and Champagne

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

Finally, a scooter that combines all the advantages of a transportable scooter with features only normally found on larger road-

going models. The Liteway 6 is uniquely practical the first and only Class 3, transportable, aluminium scooter on the market. 

Designed to travel further in comfort at 6mph, the Liteway 6 is equally at home on the road and about town. 

The Liteway 6 is the bigger brother to the successful Liteway 3 and Liteway 4 mobility scooters. This mobility scooter is viewed 

almost as a revolutionary product, it is a truly transportable 6 mph mobility scooter. To ensure the parts of the scooter are 

manageable double battery packs are used so that they weigh no more than those on a traditional travel scooter, and can be 

removed seperately, the ability to split the frame means that the scooter can be easily loaded into most car boots.

The Electric Mobility Liteway 6 is constructed from tubular aluminium for a lightweight but strong and stable. The comfortable 

padded seat and 9 inch pneumatic tyres helps to provide a very smooth ride.

Taking the Liteway 6 apart for transportation could not be easier. The frame comes apart, the seat easily detatches, and the 

batteries are easily removed with the innovative "sliding" battery box system.

The Electric Mobility Liteway 6 mobility scooter offers a potential maximum range of 16 miles and a maximum user weight capacity 

of over 21 stone, compared to most other portable scooters it far exceeds their range or speed.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Rascal 329LE is a class 3 mobility scooter with a maximum speed of up to 8 mph, built to carry a larger passenger weight for 

larger mobility scooter users.

Comfort is an importanat factor on this scooter, with all round coil-spring suspension and 12 inch robust wheels which help give 

you a smooth ride and also gives the scooter a ground clearance of 4 inches. The comfy Captains seat is fully adjustable and can 

slide to allow more legroom, adjustable width arm rests ensure you are assured of total comfort wherever you go.

The Rascal 329LE has 70ah batteries as standard, this fully roadworthy, 8mph scooter boasts a robust yet stylish design to ensure 

you can travel up to 35 miles on a full charge in total comfort, with a maximum user weight of 35 stone.

The 329LE 8mph scooter is also fitted with a full lighting kit, handbrake and superior controller for added safety and performance. 

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and 

labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Shoprider Cordoba mobility scooter is a luxurious heavy-duty scooter that offers a  

comfortable ride, combined with a massive capability.

The Shoprider Cordoba combines a pair of huge 73 ah batteries, and a chassis that will 

deliver a maximum user weight of 35 stone for up to 30 miles on a single battery 

charge, incredible!

The Cordoba also has extensive leg-room, and an adjustable Captains seat that will 

afford even the tallest of scooter users great comfort, even on a long run.

Suspension to the front and rear and large alloy wheels combine excellent comfort and 

grip and massive ground clearance, which means that the Shoprider Cordoba can take 

you almost anywhere you want to go.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier 

delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer 

call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Pride Colt Pursuit, Luxurious features at an affordable price. With its modern stylish design the Colt Pursuit stands our from other mobility scooters in its class. 

As you expect from Pride the comfort of this mobility scooter is exceptional for all terrains, all round suspension provides a smooth and comfortable ride, compliment this with large 13 inch sporty low profile wheels and you 

can see why the Colt Pursuit is such a poular addition to the Pride scooter range. The Captains seat is of high quality construction and features a headrest, reclining backrest, fold up arms which are also width adjustable and 

lastly to ensure a featherlike ride the Pride Pursuit has its own independant suspension further guaranteeing a smooth journey. The wraparound delta tiller tiller is adjustable to ensure the maximum legroom and comfort. 

The Pride Pursuit is an 8 mph class 3 mobility scooter, it has two powerful 50 ah batteries (a 70 ah version is available) which can carry a maximum user weight of 28 stone, couple this with a range of up to 21.8 miles on a full 

charge and you can rest assured this scooter will take you wherever you need to go in comfort and style. The safety features packed into this scooter are incredible for its price range, handbrake, rearview mirror, powerful front 

and rear LED lights and indicators all included as standard.

Practicality comes as standard, like the other mobility scooters from the Colt range this scooter can be dismantled for transportation. Available in 2 vibrant colours, Red and Blue.

If you are looking for an increased travel distance please take a look at the 70 ah version of the Colt Pursuit.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 months free scooter insurance all for the 

price you see!

The Shoprider Torino 8 mph mobility scooter is a heavy duty 3 wheel mobility scooter with 

the ability to carry a 35 stone user long distances.

The Torino has many features designed to ensure the comfort of the user, with all round 

suspension as standard and large pnuematic wheels this scooter is built for your comfort. 

The Captains seat has a headrest, fold up arms which are also width adjustable and for your 

complete comfort the seat can also be adjusted backwards and forwards ensuring your 

maximum legroom.

The Torino stands above many scooters in its class based on its power, speed and range. 

With two 73 ah batteries the Torino is capable of speeds up to 8 mph carrying a 35 stone 

user an amazing maximum distance of up to 34 miles on a full charge. Not many scooters 

on th UK market can boast the range and user weight of the Shoprider Torino Mobility 

Scooter.

Safety is covered with this mobility scooter, we start with lights and indicators at the front 

and rear of the scooter, reflectors to help your visibility at night and a rear view mirror for a 

clear view.

These features combined withthe 3 wheel design makes the The Shoprider Torino ideal for a 

heavy duty user who is looking for the maximum range and manoeuvrability the 3 wheel 

Torino mobility scooter provides.

All our scooters are supplied with batteries and a charger, and include free courier delivery 

to your door, 12 months parts and labour warranty including home engineer call out, and 3 

months free scooter insurance all for the price you see!

The Pride Colt Pursuit 70 ah version, Luxurious features at an affordable price. With its modern stylish design the Colt Pursuit stands our from other mobility scooters in its class. 

As you expect from Pride the comfort of this mobility scooter is exceptional for all terrains, all round suspension provides a smooth and comfortable ride, compliment this with large 13 inch sporty low profile wheels and you 

can see why the Colt Pursuit is such a poular addition to the Pride scooter range. The Captains seat is of high quality construction and features a headrest, reclining backrest, fold up arms which are also width adjustable and 

lastly to ensure a featherlike ride the Pride Pursuit has its own independant suspension further guaranteeing a smooth journey. The wraparound delta tiller tiller is adjustable to ensure the maximum legroom and comfort. 

The Pride Pursuit is an 8 mph class 3 mobility scooter, it has two powerful 70 ah batteries which can carry a maximum user weight of 28 stone, couple this with an increased range of up to 35 miles on a full charge and you 

can rest assured this scooter will take you wherever you need to go in comfort and style. The safety features packed into this scooter are incredible for its price range, handbrake, rearview mirror, powerful front and rear LED 

lights and indicators all included as standard.

Practicality comes as standard, like the other mobility scooters from the Colt range this scooter can be dismantled for transportation. Available in 2 vibrant colours, Red and Blue.

CareCo introduces the CareCo Scorpio, with its modern sleek lines and packed full of the latest technology the Scorpio is one of our best selling 8 mph class 3 mobility scooters.

Along with its stunning looks the CareCo Scorpio has been packed full of safety and comfort features to ensure a practical, robust and good looking scooter. The scooter boasts all round suspension and 13 inch low profile alloy wheels, a comfortable ride and a sporty looking mobility scooter. The Captaains seat is built for your comfort with a padded contoured swivelling seat complete with adjustable head rest, width adjustable arm rests which also fold up to allow easy access to the scooter, the seat can also recline to your desired angle.

The CareCo Scorpio mobility scooter is fitted with two powerful 50 ah batteries which pushes its 700w motor to a top speed of 8 mph over a maximum travel distance of up to 21 miles on a full charge, couple this with a maximum user weight of 25 stone and you have a great looking scooter with the range and power to take you wherever you want.

Safety is paramount on the design of the CareCo Scorpio, fitted as standard with a full LED lighting kit including front and rear LED lights and indicators.

Features you can expect from the Scorpio as standard such as drinks holder, a staggering 8 inch ground clearance, double arm suspension, 13 inch alloy wheels, adjustable tiller, digital LED dashboard, this scooter has a HUGE range of features at an affordable price for a similar 8 mph mobility scooter.

The CareCo Scorpio mobioity scooter is available in a choice of 2 vibrant colours, Silver and White.

The Drive Mercury GT is a heavy duty mobility scooter designed for Bariatric users,

weights in the 8 mph class 3 scooter range.

suspension and large pnuematic wheels. When you then add the Admirals seat with 

comfortable padding, width adjustable arm rests, headrest, reclining back and sliding 

adjustment to allow maximum legroom the Mercury GT has everything you could need for a 

comfortable ride

The power behind this scooter is the two 70 ah batteries, these powerful batteries can 

provide a maximum range of up to 30 miles on a full charge, for a maximum user weight of 

39 stone. The scooter is packed full of safety features to ensure an enjoyable and safe user 

experience, some standard features of the Mercury GT scooter include anti tip wheels, front

in style safe in the knowledge the Mercury GT is a reliable scooter packed with safety

Introducing the New Aviator mobility scooter from Drive Medical. This is the latest model from Drive and 

includes a whole range of standard features associated with top of the range mobility scooters.

For your comfort, the Drive Aviator uses independent double wishbone suspension systems to both the 

front and rear of the scooter to provide a smooth ride. Combine this with the ultra comfortable Captains seat 

which reclines, slides, swivels and has height and width adjustable armrests, riding the Aviator is effortless.

The large 13" alloy wheels add extra style and are complimented by pnuematic non marking tyres. The Delta 

tiller also has an easy to use digital control panel, which includes a clock and temperature gauge. The 

Adjustable tiller allows you to achieve the most comfortable riding position.

For safety the Drive Aviator has a full lighting system including indicators front and rear, energy efficient the 

Aviator includes a feature that allows the headlight to dim automatically by 50% to save energy when 

scooter stops. The built in cup holder is handy for storing a drink if you are planning a long journey, and a 

spacious front storage basket to hold your shopping.

The Rascal Vision sets a new standard in luxury, comfort, performace and reliability,a  scooter packed full of style 

and features for your comfort and safety.

The beautiful modern sleek lines enhances the comfort and luxury features that have gone into the production of this 

mobility scooter. The luxurious contoured Captains seat is fully adjustable to allow the rider complete comfort, 

backrest recline adjustment, armrest width adjustment, backward and forward sliding adjustment for maximum legroom, 

headrest, the full package. Making the rider smoother still is the front coil spring and shock absorber suspension, 

combine this with alloy 14 inch front wheels and 16 inch rear wheels and the delta tiller design and you have a 

comfortble, yet stylish journey. The large, backlit LED screen gives you all the information you require on your 

travels, including speed, battery charge and temperature.

The modern design and sleek styling developed for this scooter will certainly turn heads as you drive your Rascal 

Vision around town. The two 75 ah batteries will power the Rascal Vision to a speed of 8mph. If you want to use the 

scooter on long journeys you can easily drive up to 28 miles on a full charge. The Robust design and powerful features 

of this mobility scooter allows for a maximum user weight of 32 stone. For pavement use you can easily switch from 

8mph to 6mph.

Safety is an important consideration when purchasing a mobility scooter, and the Rsaacal Vision takes safety very 

seriously! The super bright LED lights fitted front and rear to ensure you can see and be seen on those dark evenings. 

There is also a twin hydraulic emergency brake system to ensure you can stop quickly in the event of an emergency. The 

Rascal Vision also has a specially developed and innovative "inertia system", that detects when you are turning 

tightly and reduces your speed automatically to reduce the risk of an accident.

The Pride Ranger Mobility Scooter, what can you say about the Pride Ranger, it is a SERIOUS mobility scooter for those 

of you who like to go all terrain!

The Pride Ranger is the most powerful mobility scooter available, if you are looking for power, ground clearance, grip 

and stabillity none compare. The Pride Ranger can be used on Golf courses and on almost any terrain. 

The mobility scooter somes with a fully adjustable grey Captains seat boasting backrest adjustment, folding armrests, 

forward and backward silding seat, all to ensure the rider has a comfortable ride with the maximum legroom. The all 

round suspension provides a stable ride, combined with the 6 inch extra wide tyres on 13 inch diameter alloy wheels 

you get lots of grip and an amazing 7.8 inch ground clearance!

The power responsible for this off road, all terrain beast of a mobility scooter are two 100 ah batteries, capable of 

carrying a maximum user weight of 28.5 stone at a maximum speed of 8mph. The Pride Ranger boasts a truly amazing 

maximum range of 40 miles on a full charge. The mobility scooter is built for use in rural areas, with a safe climbing 

angle of 17.6 degrees you can get to areas you would not consider on any other scooter. At the flick of a switch you 

can use your scooter safely on the pavement at 6mph.

The scooter is fully packed with features to ensure a safe journey, a full lighting pack including indicators front 

and rear for those journeys home as dusk appraches. Stopping power is provided by a dual regenerative and mechanical 

braking system, when the scooter stops the handbrake engages automatically. Additional safety features include; 

antislip footplate, hazard lights and horn. The Pride Ranger is built with safety in mind and practical robust use as 

its goal.

The Pride Ranger is available in two striking colours, Red and Black.
